ego.name: The Mask
ego.description: The conscious self-image; confidence, illusion of control.

id.name: The Flame
id.description: Raw desire, impulse, instinct. Acts before thought.

superego.name: The Chain
superego.description: Internalized judgment and guilt. A voice saying 'you should.'

shadow.name: That Which Remains
shadow.description: The repressed, feared, or forgotten parts of the self.

anima.name: The Mirror
anima.description: The inner Other. Empathy, emotional depth, and symbol synthesis.

persona.name: The Veil
persona.description: The social mask. How others see you. Surface over substance.

self.name: The One Who Remembers
self.description: The true center of the psyche. Can only be unlocked after integration.
self.unlock_condition: all stats must reach balance or a major story event
